content: New listing Info! HEVC is listing hotbit!!Start of Deposit:2022.06.10 05:00 AM UTCStart of Trading:2022.06.10 07:00 AM UTCHEVC: Hybrid Electric Vehicle Coin HEVC will use three types of energy. It uses fuel, electricity, and sunlight to drive using the charged battery power during the day andto mine cryptocurrency while stopping in a parking lot at night.HEVC intends to provide convenient services by incorporating blockchain into the above industry and accelerate the 4th industrial revolution in automobiles.It is a very promising project. It's because of the news of the new listing. It's not too late, so you can see good results if you buy ithttp://hevc.site/http://hevc.site/whitepaper_en.pdfhttps://hotbit.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/6642551789335-Hotbit-will-launch-HEVC-Hybrid-Electric-Vehicle-Coin-on-June-10th-2022
